message: It's in front of the brothel where Thomas brought me.
It's surprising there's a brothel in a rundown village like this, but there's also that saying about taverns, prostitutes, and undertakers being everywhere.
It's said that prostitutes are one of the world's oldest professions, and maybe that's why they're so tough—they can survive anywhere, no matter the place.

name: Cordelia
message: Welcome back, you sure took your time, huh？

name: Cordelia
message: Are the women here really that good？
I　wonder　if　you'd　rather　do　it　with　me.
Cordelia is totally in a bad mood now.
Yeah, true.
Sue
Mabel
I was able to hear something meaningful from you though...
事の顛末をどうやってコーデリアに話したものか。
どこかふたりきりになれるような場所でもあればいいのだが。
It's in front of the Brothel.
It's still daytime, with the sun high in the sky, so there aren't any customers in the shop.

name: Cordelia
message: Here again, huh？

name: Cordelia
message: Cut it out already........
コーデリアは相変わらず不機嫌なようだ。
当然といえばそのとおりだが、私だって好きで通っている訳ではない。
In front of the brothel.
まだ昼の、しかも陽も高い時間とあって、店を訪れる客の姿はない。

name: Cordelia
message: Where is this place？
How should I even explain this......
No way I can let a girl into the brothel, you know.

name: Thomas
message: Well, this is, you know.
How should I put it, it's a place where guys go to blow off steam.

name: Cordelia
message: A breather？
No way, this place‥‥‥‥‥‥

name: Cordelia
message: I've heard about that.
ここって女の人を買う所じゃないの？

name: Thomas
message: Why'd you come to a place like this?
This isn't the kind of place you come with a girl.

name: Cordelia
message: Why do you have business in a place like this?
Jonathan？

name: Jonathan
message: That is......
There's something like a Curtain hanging on the window, so you can't see inside.
The entrance is on the right, and the room right next to the door is where you meet the prostitutes, so the window next to it should obviously be for a private room.
Looks like this isn't the room I was shown to.
In that room, with the prostitute I picked......
Buying a prostitute isn’t exactly something to be proud of, but it’s an act that goes way beyond the moral standards I was raised with.
I don't see anyone in the room.
Looks like there aren't any customers here.
Even though it's the only brothel in town, hardly any customers come—maybe it's because people in this poor village just can't afford to buy women that often.
It's a room for 'showing faces,' so to speak, where clients and prostitutes meet.
Even if you say 'choose,' there are only two prostitutes in this village.
That is, aside from that overly generous Madam.
Even though there are two young girls besides, would any client bother to pick an older woman?
Well, unless that's your kink, but if you're paying money to bang a chick, I doubt anyone would pick that Madam.
You can't peek in from outside, but since there doesn't seem to be any clients around, the prostitutes are probably bored out of their minds.
The Madam who's serious about running her business probably doesn't like seeing her two young prostitutes just killing time like that.
It's definitely built way more stylishly than regular houses in Arkham.
Slathering plaster over the bricks makes it look like a heavily made-up woman, and it really matches the vibe inside, I think.
Knowing full well what goes down in that house every night, no matter how fancy the place is, I just can't feel anything like 'beautiful' about it.
Even so, why is there a brothel in Arkham in the first place?
It’s not like there aren’t all sorts of other things this place is lacking, after all.
The door to the brothel doesn't seem to ever be locked, day or night.
Sneaking into the place where the prostitutes who make even themselves feel good live—do they just think it’s tasteless, even if it’s a thief doing it?
Or is it that, for prostitutes, their only asset is their own body, and it's a sign that they feel there's nothing else to steal from them？
Either way, it's a bold move, but for these girls who are always running into dangerous situations, it might not be something they'd particularly care about.
The door of the Brothel doesn't seem to be locked at any time, day or night.
It's incredibly convenient for the customers, but in a women-run brothel, it seems a bit too careless.

name: Cordelia
message: I get the situation, but you being in Bed with any woman other than me isn't something I'm grateful for.

name: Cordelia
message: You're done with your business now, right？
Then I don't want you to ever come here again.

name: Cordelia
message: What is it......

name: Cordelia
message: Are you saying you have something to explain to me？
Go ahead, let's hear it.

name: Jonathan
message: This isn't a good place for this.
Let's go somewhere we can be alone.

name: Cordelia
message: どうしてみんなの前では言えないのよ。
Is there something that shady going on behind the scenes？

name: Jonathan
message: Anyway, can you just listen to me?
I'm sure you'll understand.

name: Cordelia
message: Got it.
I'll at least hear you out.
ふたりだけになれる場所か、何処がいいだろう。
A place where I don't have to worry about Gardner or Thomas overhearing me...

name: Cordelia
message: I'm not going inside, okay?
どうしてもって言うならあなた方だけでどうぞ。

name: Cordelia
message: I'm not going inside, okay?
If you insist, then go ahead and do it by yourselves.

name: Gardner
message: Maybe I’ll pass too.
Intense　exercise　is　bad　for　old　folks,　you　know.

name: Thomas
message: Can't be helped, let's just go, the two of us.
But, trying to buy another woman right in front of your own girl... Even I don't think that's cool.
Thomas is looking at me with a reproachful look.
Gardner seems kind of tolerant, with an expression like he can't help it.
Looks like I should get out of here before they start telling stories about their wild youth.
Since there's something weird about Thomas, we can't talk about it right in front of him.
It's probably better to explain it to Cordelia later.
When the hot-tempered Cordelia gets upset, it'll probably be pretty tough to make it up to her later.
Maybe I really should've come alone at night… but there's no point worrying about it now.
Was with Thomas last night
Sue
Mabel
I have to meet them.
It's unthinkable that Thomas, who's not a generous guy, would give a prostitute more than the usual tip.
There's definitely something fishy going on.
I seriously doubt he was really at the brothel until morning.

name: Cordelia
message: What's up？
Why don't you just go already.

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, I will.

name: Cordelia
message: I never thought you were that kind of guy, Jonathan. I'll tell you right now, I don't accept 'being a man' as an excuse.

name: Cordelia
message: What are you thinking, coming to a place like this right in front of me?

name: Cordelia
message: Are you saying it's really so important to come buy a woman？
Jonathan, don’t tell me you’ve been coming to a place like this all this time.

name: Jonathan
message: Last night was the first time I've ever been with a prostitute.
And　that　too,　being　dragged　along　by　Thomas,　forced‥‥‥‥‥

name: Cordelia
message: You mean by force？
If you don't like it, just say no. Why don't you?

name: Jonathan
message: That's...

name: Cordelia
message: See, look at that.
You can't even talk back, can you? And anyway, why do we have to come back at a time like this?

name: Cordelia
message: If you have a problem with me, just say it straight！

name: Jonathan
message: I told you that's not it.
I'll explain later, so can you please stop being so selfish all the time?

name: Cordelia
message: Fine, I get it.
Do whatever you want then！
Map
Go inside
